org.apache.juneau.marshall

Class PlainText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.marshall.Marshall
      • org.apache.juneau.marshall.CharMarshall
        • org.apache.juneau.marshall.PlainText

  • public class PlainText
extends CharMarshall
    A pairing of a PlainTextSerializer and PlainTextParser into a single class with convenience read/write methods.

    The general idea is to combine a single serializer and parser inside a simplified API for reading and writing POJOs.

    Examples:

    // Using instance. PlainText plainText = new PlainText(); MyPojo myPojo = plainText.read(string, MyPojo.class); String string = plainText.write(myPojo);

    // Using DEFAULT instance. MyPojo myPojo = PlainText.DEFAULT.read(string, MyPojo.class); String string = PlainText.DEFAULT.write(myPojo);

    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-marshall > Marshalls
    See Also:
